name: taskchampion.public.dappnode.eth
description:
TaskChampion Sync Server enables synchronization of Taskwarrior tasks across multiple devices. All task data is encrypted end-to-end.

After installation, configure your Taskwarrior clients with:
- sync.server.url: http://taskchampion.public.dappnode:8080
- sync.server.client_id: [Your configured client ID]
author: Jacob Czepluch (@czepluch)
